taskbody.prereq: These steps assume that a module of type auto-complete is open in your editor.

step.cmd: Drop an auto-complete design widget into the module.
In the Properties view, set the attributes composing the auto-complete output item.
Press Ctrl+G keys to save and generate code for the module.

taskbody.result: The module auto-complete can now be referenced from a search field. Please refer to the section "Setting a search field widget" for more details.
